DOC.detailed_description: Study Procedures This study three phase : 1 . The screening eligibility phase : Parent child conduct initial evaluation last 4 hour . The evaluator ask question participant complete form his/her mood behavior . This intake appointment determine eligibility study . 2 . The treatment phase : The child would begin kind talk therapy call interpersonal psychotherapy . The goal therapy decrease teenager ' depression help improve relationship communication skill . The child attend 12 therapy appointment course 16 week . Each appointment 50 minute long . If child well standard interpersonal therapy , continue without change . If child improve enough , change treatment plan one two way . The choice base chance ( sort like flip coin ) do computer . ***Your child attend 16 therapy appointment ( four additional session ) . These additional four session schedule child attend therapy twice week period four week . -OR- ***Your child continue attend 12 therapy appointment course 16 week child also prescribe antidepressant medication call fluoxetine . Fluoxetine also know Prozac . Prozac approve Food Drug Administration use treatment depress teenager . You responsible pay medication . At four point treatment phase ( week 4 , week 8 , week 12 , week 16 ) , parent child ask complete form interview see child . The evaluation week 4 , 8 , 12 take approximately 1 hour . At end treatment , parent child longer meeting evaluator ( 4 hour ) see treatment child get helpful . During meeting , also ask participant fill form mood mental health treatment . 3 . The follow-up phase : Parent child ask return follow-up assessment 4 month child completes treatment phase see . Parent child ask complete form interview . This meeting take approximately 4 hour .
